title: Week Review: co & Fu'ivla
goal: Review all vocabulary and grammar from Week 13.

sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

Quick recall — all 8 gismu:

hot → ?       clean → ?
cold → ?      pure → ?
wet → ?       drop → ?
dry → ?       water → ?

(Answers: glare, jinsa, lenku, curve, cilmo, dirgo, sudga, djacu)

Grammar Summary (3-4 min)

What You Learned This Week

1. Temperature/Moisture Vocabulary (8 gismu)

Lojban English Lojban English
glare hot jinsa clean
lenku cold curve pure
cilmo wet dirgo drop
sudga dry djacu water

2. co — Tanru Inversion

  • A co B = B A in meaning
  • Place structure from word BEFORE co
  • gerku co blanu = blue dog (x1 = dog)

3. Fu'ivla — Borrowed Words

  • Must have consonant cluster
  • Must end in vowel
  • Examples: tcati, kurki, kafke

Self-Test (5-6 min)

Part A: Vocabulary (8 points)

Translate to English:

  1. glare →
  2. cilmo →
  3. jinsa →
  4. djacu →

Translate to Lojban:

  1. cold →
  2. dry →
  3. pure →
  4. drop →
Answers
  1. hot
  2. wet
  3. clean
  4. water
  5. lenku
  6. sudga
  7. curve
  8. dirgo

Part B: co (8 points)

Convert to co form:

  1. blanu gerku → ?
  2. glare djacu → ?

What is the meaning?

  1. zdani co barda co jinsa = ?
  2. mlatu co cmalu co xekri = ?

What is x1?

  1. gerku co melbi → x1 = ?
  2. djacu co lenku → x1 = ?

Translate using co:

  1. I drink hot clean water. → ?
  2. I see a big blue dog. → ?
Answers
  1. gerku co blanu
  2. djacu co glare
  3. big clean house
  4. small black cat
  5. dog
  6. water
  7. mi pinxe lo djacu co glare co jinsa
  8. mi viska lo gerku co barda co blanu

Part C: Fu'ivla (4 points)

Translate:

  1. I drink tea. → ?
  2. The coffee is hot. → ?
  3. I eat a cookie. → ?
  4. The pizza is cold. → ?
Answers
  1. mi pinxe la .tcati.
  2. la .kafke. cu glare
  3. mi citka la .kurki.
  4. la .pitsa. cu lenku

Integration Challenge (1-2 min)

Order drinks and food:

Use at least:

  • Two temperature words
  • One cleanliness word
  • co for descriptions
  • One fu'ivla

Example:

mi djica lo djacu co lenku co jinsa
.i mi citka la .kurki. co glare
.i mi pinxe la .tcati. co glare

(I want cold clean water. I eat a hot cookie. I drink hot tea.)

Create your own and say it aloud.

Week 13 Complete Reference

Gismu (8):

Lojban English Lojban English
glare hot jinsa clean
lenku cold curve pure
cilmo wet dirgo drop
sudga dry djacu water

Grammar:

Item Function
co Tanru inversion
fu'ivla Borrowed words

Cumulative vocabulary: ~114 words

Summary

You completed Week 13. You can now use co to invert tanru and recognize fu'ivla (borrowed words).

Next week preview: Week 14 is a compound words review, covering tanru, lujvo, fu'ivla, and co together.
